name: Afflict
oracle_text:
Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: One rarely notices a heartbeat, save when it is stolen.

name: Aggressive Urge
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: The power of the wild, concentrated in a single charge.

name: Anaba Bodyguard
oracle_text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text:
"They who challenge a minotaur enjoy the taste of their own blood."
—Mirri of the *Weatherlight*

name: Angelic Blessing
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: Only the warrior who can admit mortal weakness will be bolstered by immortal strength.

name: Angelic Wall
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Flying
flavor_text:
"The Ancestor protects us in ways we can't begin to comprehend."
—Mystic elder

name: Assassinate
oracle_text: Destroy target tapped creature.
flavor_text:
"This is how wars are won—not with armies of soldiers but with a single knife blade, artfully placed."
—Yurin, royal assassin

name: Aven Cloudchaser
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Aven Cloudchaser enters the battlefield, destroy target enchantment.

name: Aven Fisher
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Aven Fisher dies, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: The same spears that catch their food today will defend their homes tomorrow.

name: Aven Windreader
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{1}{U}: Target player reveals the top card of their library.
flavor_text: "The tiniest ripple tells a story ten fathoms deep."

name: Bandage
oracle_text:
Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Life is measured in inches. To a healer, every one of those inches is precious.

name: Benalish Knight
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text:
"We called them 'armored lightning.'"
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

name: Bloodrock Cyclops
oracle_text: Bloodrock Cyclops attacks each combat if able.
flavor_text:
"There are only fifty words in the cyclops language, and ten of them mean 'kill.'"
—Ertai

name: Bogardan Firefiend
oracle_text: When Bogardan Firefiend dies, it deals 2 damage to target creature.
flavor_text:
"The next one who tells me to relax and curl up by a fire is dead."
—Mirri of the *Weatherlight*

name: Boomerang
oracle_text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Early Jamuraan hunters devised a weapon that would return to its source. Tolarian Aethermancers developed a spell that skipped the weapon entirely.

name: Cancel
oracle_text: Counter target spell.

name: Canopy Spider
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: It keeps the upper reaches of the forest free of every menace . . . except for the spider itself.

name: Civic Wayfinder
oracle_text: When Civic Wayfinder enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: "These alleys are not safe. Come, I can guide you back to the market square."

name: Cloud Elemental
oracle_text:
Flying
Cloud Elemental can block only creatures with flying.
flavor_text: The soratami surround their sky-castles with living clouds that serve as both sword and shield.

name: Cloud Sprite
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Cloud Sprite can block only creatures with flying.
flavor_text: The delicate sprites carry messages for Saprazzans, but they refuse to land in Mercadia City's filthy markets.

name: Commune with Nature
oracle_text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Contaminated Bond
oracle_text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Whenever enchanted creature attacks or blocks, its controller loses 3 life.

name: Counsel of the Soratami
oracle_text: Draw two cards.
flavor_text: "Wisdom is not the counting of all the drops in a waterfall. Wisdom is learning why the water seeks the earth."

name: Crafty Pathmage
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text:
Follow the pathmage
—Otarian expression meaning "escape quickly"

name: Craw Wurm
flavor_text: The most terrifying thing about the craw wurm is probably the horrible crashing sound it makes as it speeds through the forest. This noise is so loud it echoes through the trees and seems to come from all directions at once.

name: Dehydration
oracle_text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

name: Demolish
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or land.
flavor_text:
"Pound the steel until it fits. Doesn't work? Bash to bits."
—Dwarven forging song

name: Demystify
oracle_text: Destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text:
"Illusion is a crutch for those with no grounding in reality."
—Cho-Manno

name: Distress
oracle_text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor_text:
"They say the eyes are the windows to the soul. I like to break windows and take what's inside."
—Braids, dementia summoner

name: Dross Crocodile
flavor_text:
"As soon as it surfaced, we could all smell it. Its rancid breath reeked of half-digested carrion and its own rotting innards."
—Dafri, Auriok champion

name: Duct Crawler
oracle_text: {1}{R}: Target creature can't block Duct Crawler this turn.
flavor_text:
"Boss told us to try and train 'em. Trained it to attack—it ate Flugg. Trained it to run fast—it got away. Success!"
—Dlig, goblin spelunker

name: Dusk Imp
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Imps are just intelligent enough to have an understanding of cruelty.

name: Elvish Berserker
oracle_text: Whenever Elvish Berserker becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.
flavor_text: Their fury scatters enemies like a pile of dry leaves.

name: Essence Drain
oracle_text: Essence Drain deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
flavor_text:
"The elves are right: Death inevitably leads to life. But the truly powerful don't just experience this cycle. They control it."
—Crovax, ascendant evincar

name: Fear
oracle_text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

name: Festering Goblin
oracle_text: When Festering Goblin dies, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: In life, it was a fetid, disease-ridden thing. In death, not much changed.

name: Firebreathing
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

name: Fists of the Anvil
oracle_text: Target creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Gron's mind reeled with possibilities, most of which are best left unmentioned.

name: Fugitive Wizard
flavor_text:
"The law has its place—as a footnote in my spellbook."
—Siyani, fugitive mage

name: Ghost Warden
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"I thought of fate as an iron lattice, intricate but rigidly unchangeable. That was until some force bent fate's bars to spare my life."
—Ilromov, traveling storyteller

name: Giant Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

name: Giant Spider
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text:
"When I trained under Multani, he bade me sit for hours watching Yavimaya's spiders. From them I learned stealth, patience, and the best way to snare a wind drake."
—Mirri of the *Weatherlight*

name: Goblin Elite Infantry
oracle_text: Whenever Goblin Elite Infantry blocks or becomes blocked, it gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: They talk a good fight.

name: Goblin Piker
flavor_text: Once he'd worked out which end of the thing was sharp, he was promoted to guard duty.

name: Goblin Sky Raider
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: The goblin word for "flying" is more accurately translated as "falling slowly."

name: Gravedigger
oracle_text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: A full coffin is like a full coffer—both are attractive to thieves.

name: Grizzly Bears
flavor_text:
"We cannot forget that among all of Dominaria's wonders, a system of life exists, with prey and predators that will never fight wars nor vie for ancient power."
—Jolrael, empress of beasts

name: Heart of Light
oracle_text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.

name: Highway Robber
oracle_text: When Highway Robber enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: "Tonight, madam, it's your money *and* your life."

name: Hill Giant
flavor_text: Fortunately, hill giants have large blind spots in which a human can easily hide. Unfortunately, these blind spots are beneath the bottoms of their feet.

name: Holy Day
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
flavor_text:
"Today there is feasting and peace across our land, but the war has not ended. Tuck away your bloodlust. You'll need it tomorrow."
—Karrim, Samite healer

name: Holy Strength
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.

name: Honor Guard
oracle_text: {W}: Honor Guard gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The strength of one. The courage of ten.

name: Horseshoe Crab
oracle_text: {U}: Untap Horseshoe Crab.
flavor_text:
"Hmm . . . It looks kinda like a bug. Let's crack it open an' see if it tastes like one!"
—Squee, goblin cabin hand

name: Incinerate
oracle_text: Incinerate deals 3 damage to any target. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.
flavor_text:
"Yes, I think 'toast' is an appropriate description."
—Jaya Ballard, task mage

name: Kavu Climber
oracle_text: When Kavu Climber enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text:
"There was a crack of branches, a rustle of leaves, then a tremendous roar. Our party had no chance as death descended from above."
—Taseen, elvish bard

name: Lava Axe
oracle_text: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: "Catch!"

name: Lightning Elemental
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor_text:
"A flash of the lightning, a break of the wave, He passes from life to his rest in the grave."
—William Knox, "Mortality"

name: Llanowar Elves
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor_text:
One bone broken for every twig snapped underfoot.
—Llanowar penalty for trespassing

name: Llanowar Sentinel
oracle_text: When Llanowar Sentinel enters the battlefield, you may pay {1}{G}. If you do, search your library for a card named Llanowar Sentinel, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor_text:
"The forest has as many eyes as leaves."
—Mirri of the *Weatherlight*

name: Looming Shade
oracle_text: {B}: Looming Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Its form never rests, propelled by some undetectable gale from beyond the gloom.

name: Loxodon Mystic
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor_text: Elder mystics take their vow of silence so seriously that they impose it on any who enter their presence.

name: Lumengrid Warden
flavor_text: The wardens keep watch over an endless sea of progress.

name: Mass of Ghouls
flavor_text:
"An army has filled the valley, but it's not like any army I've ever seen. There are no tents, no fires, no horses . . . just a sea of bodies, writhing and moaning, as if a pestilent village were sent to invade us."
—Onean scout

name: Merfolk Looter
oracle_text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor_text:
It belongs to the merfolk now.
—Shipwreck prayer

name: Mind Rot
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards.
flavor_text:
"The beauty of mental attacks is that your victims never remember them."
—Volrath

name: Naturalize
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"Well, it also makes a very nice flower pot. . . ."
—Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi machinist

name: Natural Spring
oracle_text: Target player gains 8 life.
flavor_text:
"Jewels cannot be eaten nor gold drunk. What civilization trades, nature simply provides."
—Molimo, maro-sorcerer

name: Overgrowth
oracle_text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional {G}{G}.

name: Pacifism
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
flavor_text: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

name: Peek
oracle_text:
Look at target player's hand.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Sometimes you have to read between the minds.

name: Phyrexian Rager
oracle_text: When Phyrexian Rager enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor_text: It takes no prisoners, but it keeps the choicest bits for Phyrexia.

name: Pincher Beetles
oracle_text: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor_text:
"No fair! Since when does a bug get ta munch on *me*?"
—Squee, goblin cabin hand

name: Plague Beetle
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor_text: No one knows whether they were named for the disease they carry or for the speed at which they multiply.

name: Prodigal Pyromancer
oracle_text: {T}: Prodigal Pyromancer deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: "What am I looking at? Ashes, dead man."

name: Raging Goblin
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor_text: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

name: Rampant Growth
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Nature grows solutions to her problems.

name: Ravenous Rats
oracle_text: When Ravenous Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.
flavor_text: Nothing is sacred to rats. Everything is simply another meal.

name: Recover
oracle_text:
Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: As Barrin exhumed his daughter's body, he finally realized the full price of his faith in Urza.

name: Remove Soul
oracle_text: Counter target creature spell.
flavor_text: When your enemies are denied soldiers, they are denied victory.

name: Reviving Dose
oracle_text:
You gain 3 life.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Samite healers never mix their pungent elixir with sweetener or tea. The threat of a second dose is enough to get most warriors back on their feet.

name: Robe of Mirrors
oracle_text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

name: Rock Badger
oracle_text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
flavor_text:
"As it charged our keep, I mistook it for a bear. After it tore through our ramparts and half the guard, I wished it had been a bear after all."
—Ballista guard

name: Rootwalla
oracle_text: {1}{G}: Rootwalla gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text: If you try to sneak up on a rootwalla, you'll suddenly find yourself dealing with twice the lizard.

name: Rootwater Commando
oracle_text: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
flavor_text: Rootwater merfolk are seldom seen these days, but elf corpses are as numerous as ever.

name: Rushwood Dryad
oracle_text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor_text: To a dryad, every tree in the forest is both a doorway and a window.

name: Sage Owl
oracle_text:
Flying
When Sage Owl enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

name: Samite Healer
oracle_text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor_text: Healers ultimately acquire the divine gifts of spiritual and physical wholeness. The most devout are also granted the ability to pass physical wholeness on to others.

name: Scathe Zombies
flavor_text:
"They groaned, they stirred, they all uprose, Nor spake, nor moved their eyes; It had been strange, even in a dream, To have seen those dead men rise."
—Samuel Taylor Coleridge, "The Rime of the Ancient Mariner"

name: Sea Monster
oracle_text: Sea Monster can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
flavor_text: It's easy to believe the monster is a myth—until you feel three hundred thousand pounds of myth crashing down on your ship.

name: Severed Legion
oracle_text: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
flavor_text: No one in Aphetto answers a knock at the door after sundown.

name: Shimmering Wings
oracle_text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature has flying. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{U}: Return Shimmering Wings to its owner's hand.

name: Shock
oracle_text: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.

name: Sift
oracle_text: Draw three cards, then discard a card.
flavor_text: Dwell longest on the thoughts that shine brightest.

name: Skyhunter Patrol
oracle_text: Flying, first strike (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach, and it deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text:
"We leonin have come to rule the plains by taking to the skies."
—Raksha Golden Cub

name: Skyhunter Prowler
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach, and attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
flavor_text: As tireless as her mount, a skyhunter's vigil is measured in days.

name: Skyshroud Ranger
oracle_text: {T}: You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text: Not even the elves truly know the Skyshroud Forest. The rangers are merely the best equipped to handle its uncertainty.

name: Smash
oracle_text:
Destroy target artifact.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Ravnica's laws protect not its citizens but its industry. Aging equipment is destroyed rather than restored, to bring more money into the factories' coffers.

name: Snapping Drake
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: The irritable drakes are solitary nesters. Even brooding females barely contain the urge to attack their own young.

name: Spined Wurm
flavor_text: Its spines act like the teeth of a saw, scoring distinctive marks in the vegetation of its territory.

name: Spineless Thug
oracle_text: Spineless Thug can't block.
flavor_text: What it lacks in backbone, it makes up for in cruelty.

name: Spitting Earth
oracle_text: Spitting Earth deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.
flavor_text:
"Within each of you is the strength of a landslide."
—Kumano, to his pupils

name: Stalking Tiger
oracle_text: Stalking Tiger can't be blocked by more than one creature.
flavor_text: In the Jamuraan jungles, there is often no separating beauty from danger.

name: Steadfast Guard
oracle_text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
flavor_text: "Best leave your tongue in its yap-hole, Mercadian scum, for your silvered words and golden bribes do not sparkle so brightly outside your city."

name: Stun
oracle_text:
Target creature can't block this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Fortunately, merfolk aren't used to opponents with feet."
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

name: Suntail Hawk
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Its eye the glaring sun, its cry the keening wind.

name: Terramorphic Expanse
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Take two steps north into the unsettled future, south into the unquiet past, east into the present day, or west into the great unknown.

name: Terror
oracle_text: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

name: Treetop Bracers
oracle_text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.
flavor_text: Gravity is truly what you make of it.

name: Tundra Wolves
oracle_text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text:
"I heard their eerie howling, the wolves calling their kindred across the frozen plains."
—Onean scout

name: Twitch
oracle_text:
You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Battles are won in nuance.

name: Uncontrollable Anger
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and attacks each combat if able.

name: Unholy Strength
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1.
flavor_text: Such power grows the body as it shrinks the soul.

name: Unsummon
oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Tolarian apprentices learn to liberate Ætheric energy long before they are taught to bind it.

name: Vampire Bats
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{B}: Vampire Bats gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate no more than twice each turn.

name: Venerable Monk
oracle_text: When Venerable Monk enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: Age wears the flesh but galvanizes the soul.

name: Viashino Runner
oracle_text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text:
"It moved this way, an' that way, an' then before I could stick it, it jumped over my head an' was gone."
—Jula, goblin raider

name: Viashino Sandscout
oracle_text:
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
At the beginning of the end step, return Viashino Sandscout to its owner's hand. (Return it only if it's on the battlefield.)

name: Wall of Wood
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
flavor_text: Orcish lumberjacks spent the night sharpening their blades and resting for a day of labor. They awoke to find that the forest had been making its own preparations.

name: Warrior's Honor
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The day will come when the righteous warrior faces a battle she cannot win. She will greet that day as she has any other."
—Asmira, holy avenger

name: Wild Griffin
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"I abandoned my dream of a squadron of griffin-riders when the cost proved too high. Three trainers were eaten for every griffin broken to the bridle."
—King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Youthful Knight
oracle_text: First strike
flavor_text: Idealism fits him better than his armor.
